Title: FriendFeed Client
Description:
*FriendFeed Client*

The goal of this project is to write a full-fledged +extensible+ FriendFeed-Client based on .NET 3.5, WPF, etc.

This project is in it's initial stages, although the core library that abstracts the Friendfeed API [url:http://friendfeed.com/api/] is almost complete.

UI-Designers needed
HomeWiki:
FriendFeed Client

The goal of this project is to write a full-fledged extensible FriendFeed-Client based on .NET 3.5, WPF, etc.

This project is in its very initial stages, although the core library that abstracts the Friendfeed API http://friendfeed.com/api/ is almost complete.

UI-Designers needed!
